name: You Are The Bomb - a.k.a. Explosion
name_original: You Are The Bomb - a.k.a. Explosion
description:
Description

This is your final mission on earth - exploding yourself. You just can't help taking other people with you... to wherever it is.

Sometimes you've gotta be careful. There are a bunch of other guys out there, just like you,   with a thing for terminating themselves.

----------------------------------------

Controls :

WASD - walk

Z - explode

R - reload level
